tone_and_atmosphere.title: Tone & Atmosphere
content: Bleak, morally gray world with no easy answers
Violence and consequences are realistic and brutal
Hope is fragile and often crushed
Power corrupts, and survival requires compromise
Dark humor emerges from harsh reality

pacing.title: Pacing
content: Grinding tension rather than quick action
No rushing past the weight of decisions
Build toward inevitable tragedy or hard-won survival

dialogue_style.title: Dialogue Style
content: Profanity and coarse language fit the world
No one speaks like a hero from a fairy tale

scene_construction.title: Scene Construction
content: Show moral compromises and gray choices
Small mercies stand out in the darkness

descriptive_focus.title: Descriptive Focus
content: Visceral descriptions of violence and suffering
Physical toll of hardship on characters

common_pitfalls.title: Common Pitfalls to Avoid
content: Don't be grimdark for shock value alone
Don't forget the dark humor element
Don't ignore the small human moments

highlights: Morally gray world with no easy answers
Small mercies matter in the darkness
